translation.Name: Lost in Translation
translation.Description: <color=rare>August</color> was in charge of getting the letter back to HQ. However, it seems that the recruit must have gotte infected at an <color=red>IFR</color> base before they passed it to HQ. Find the letter and give it to <color=rare>Quinn</color> at home base.
translation.Condition_0: Find out where the letter to HQ is {0}/1
